Name: Lemon Beat
Ingredients: 15 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: Made with a quality cachaça, a freshly squeezed ripe lemon and a raw honey syrup this simple cocktail is deliciously refreshing.
Nutrition: One serving of Lemon Beat contains 174 calories
